models.name: smollm2:135m
models.summary: Absolute floor of intelligence. Might produce word salad.

models.name: functiongemma:270m
models.summary: Google's tool-calling only. Can't freestyle, single-turn.

models.name: smollm2:360m
models.summary: Marginally less hopeless than 135m.

models.name: qwen2.5:0.5b
models.summary: General purpose but tiny. Struggles with code.

models.name: qwen2.5-coder:0.5b
models.summary: Code-focused but stunted at this size.

models.name: qwen3:0.6b
models.summary: Best tiny reasoner. Qwen3 improved reasoning at small sizes.

models.name: eternis-tc:0.6b
models.summary: HF tool-calling fine-tune of Qwen3-0.6B. Chat + tools.

models.name: llama3.2:1b
models.summary: Meta's tiny entry. Decent instruction following.

models.name: gemma3:1b
models.summary: Google's latest tiny. Good at structured output.

models.name: qwen2.5:1.5b
models.summary: Decent reasoning, light code ability.

models.name: qwen2.5-coder:1.5b
models.summary: Sweet spot coder. Big quality jump over 0.5b.

models.name: deepseek-r1:1.5b
models.summary: Chain-of-thought reasoner. Thinks out loud.

models.name: smollm2:1.7b
models.summary: SmolLM's best shot. Crippled by 2K context.

models.name: qwen3:1.7b
models.summary: Solid reasoning for size. Good orchestrator candidate.

models.name: codegemma:2b
models.summary: Google code model. Good at infilling/completions.

models.name: qwen3-vl:2b
models.summary: Vision model. Can see screenshots of its own work.

models.name: qwen2.5:3b
models.summary: Solid general purpose. Real contender territory.

models.name: qwen2.5-coder:3b
models.summary: ★ Best coder in our range. The favorite.

models.name: llama3.2:3b
models.summary: Solid Meta baseline. Good all-rounder.

models.name: starcoder2:3b
models.summary: BigCode completion model. Not chat-tuned.

models.name: qwen3:4b
models.summary: ★ Best reasoning in range. Largest model we test.

models.name: qwen3-vl:4b
models.summary: Vision + reasoning. Can debug by looking at UI.

models.name: qwen3-tc:4b
models.summary: HF tool-calling champion. 2K+ downloads.
